name: TopDownSpaceGame
description:
"It's so irritating when you go on your long awaited space adventure and suddenly your ship is struck down by those pesky dummy robots! You have to find a way out from their tiny planet and continue on your journey."

It's a pretty short game. About 10 - 15 minutes of frantic bullet-dodging and shooting back.

WARNING: This game may be hard on GPU so if you are facing
framerate issues consider downloading a desktop version and launching it
locally.
